entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @realDonaldTrump Coronavirus started Jan. In China &Trump refused 2 work w other countries to dev. test by WHO. All countries jumped on-board & agreed & started working. Trump ignored alarms! He cut infectious disease unit, CDC, PHI & for 2 yrs has not filled pos. in WH global hlth security
